prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Pipe, Guitar, Drums, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Pipe, Guitar, Drums - but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Pipe, Guitar, Drums - omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This composition is Piano, Pipe, Guitar, Drums - Bass is absent.
